emptyLobbyState.title: Empty Lobby
emptyLobbyState.text: No players are currently in the lobby. Add some players to get the match going.

bullOffHelpText: The bull-off determines the order of players. Each player throws a dart at the bullseye. The player closest to the bullseye starts the game.
playerCanBullOff: {{FIRST_NAME}} it's your turn! Throw a dart at the bullseye.
bullOffFinished: The bull-off is finished. Drag and drop the players to change the order.
